name: The Demon Crab
description:
Heroes of the Far East #3

Hidden beneath the waves of the Far East Sea. Thousands upon thousands of corpses, the grim reminder of the last great war that once fought on top of the Far East Sea.

One particular corpse, wearing the armor of once great warrior. Perished after being betrayed by one of his own trusted ally left behind a curse. A curse full of hatred towards the kingdom of the Far East. Sworn that one day he'll be back to spread terror and destruction.

The curse transformed his body into a Demon, with the appearance of half-human half-crab, granting him ability to control the sea and it's creatures. Sworn to bring destruction to the kingdom, he marches out of the sea with a demonic army of fallen soldiers and sea monsters.
